About Us

Jisep is a premier logistics and transportation provider that offer customers quality and timely services. A family-owned business established in 2019 provides a range of expedited transportation and distribution services within North America.

Core Values

Jisep strives to place ourselves in customers and teammates shoes, we treat them how we want to be treated by showing EMPATHY daily. We show INTEGRITY by making and sticking to hard decisions which ensures that PROFITABLE services are Provided to CUSTOMER FIRST.
